content: Thanks for everything today! I'll head out later to collect more Luca. I believe we'll see the planet grow again very soon.
info: 躺下入梦-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I'll continue checking the supplies we need with Glenn, and remind Esassani to drive safely during transport. As for you...
info: 躺下入梦-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A灵光一现}The last and most important thing today is to <style=Highlight>head home, get in bed</style>, and rest up for the new day ahead.
info: 躺下入梦-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A想象}There'll be more and more new Neighbors moving in, hoho... Don't worry, everything is going as planned.
info: 躺下入梦-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}For now, hoho! Just <style=Highlight>go home and hop into bed</style>, get a good night's sleep, and be ready for whatever changes tomorrow may bring.
info: 躺下入梦-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II
